name: demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: pnpm run test:gen ; pnpm run fix:lcov
scripts.test-integration: pnpm run test:gen-integration ; pnpm run fix:lcov
scripts.release: cd ../../../ && bash build-script/container/release-api.sh demo-exm-webapi mcs-fastify demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify exm-data
scripts.docker:build: docker image prune -f && cd ../../../release && docker build -f container-apps/demo-exm-webapi/mcs-fastify/Dockerfile -t demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify .
scripts.docker:run: docker rm -f demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify  && cd ../../../release && docker run -p 4001:3000 --env-file container-apps/demo-exm-webapi/mcs-fastify/.env --name demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify:latest
scripts.docker:remove: docker rm  -f -v demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify && docker rmi demo-exm-webapi-mcs-fastify
